name: Alloodo
description: A proprietary web application paired with a RESTful API allowing users to rent games to or from nearby users

name: CloudLock
description: A smart-lock mobile app authenticated through Face ID and NFC, backed with an API and web dashboard for managing users and their activity

name: The Perpetuator
description: A 3D / 2D perspective shift game built with Unreal Engine 4. Placed 1st for best 3D game at Dufferin Peel's annual game design competition hosted at the University of Toronto Mississauga.

name: Wild Tiger Thai
description: A static restaurant website built with a GraphQL backend, allowing the owners to easily modify menu items and images by modifying JSON.

name: Fit Together
description: A cross-platform mobile app to help people organize fitness events and find workout partners. Awarded Best Use of Google Cloud Platform at DeltaHacks V.

name: Contest Programming
description: A repository containing implementations of common algorithms and data structures over a variety of topics. Also includes a sample of problem solutions completed on online judges.

name: Portfolio Website
description: The website that you're looking at right now. A static & responsive website built with Gatsby.

name: Kingdom Hearts III Countdown
description: A simple real-time countdown application for the launch of Kingdom Hearts III.
